title: Multimedia-Enhanced Elementary Science Inquiry Skills Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science concepts and basic digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Utilizing simulation/VR content in smartphone-centric limited technology environments, emphasizing science inquiry methods applicable to primary education through parallel individual and collaborative learning

learning_goals: Learners can design individual and collaborative inquiry processes using multimedia science materials.
Learners can systematically analyze connections between scientific concepts in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can produce poster-style outputs by applying digital data-processing strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
